ROW.title: 60% off Gourmet Lollipops
ROW.description:
Luckily for the lollipop industry, there's a sucker born every minute. Set up your own in-home candy bar with this WagJag: $29 for 60 gourmet lollipops (a $72 value).
These long-lasting candies provide sweet satisfaction with their golf ball size and vibrant colour. Each package of 60 individually wrapped, USA-made pops contains an array of mouth-watering flavours. But just what flavour each one is will have to be determined by your tongue - this bounty of bonbons are labeled only as "Mystery Flavour" and each box contains a random assortment. To help solve the candy conundrum, here is the complete list:

ROW.title: 50 % on ATV rental
ROW.description:
ATVs are capable of travelling over any land surface, though people usually don't appreciate it when you use them inside the house, through the maternity ward of a hospital or down the aisle at your wedding. Ride free of social judgment with today's WagJag: $59 for a one-hour ATV adventure from Ride on Rentals (a $120 value).
Already a specialist in providing exciting outdoor excursions throughout the rugged Collingwood landscape, Ride on Rentals has expanded their fleet of land and water vehicles to now include a collection of newly minted, state-of-the-art all-terrain vehicles (ATVs) for speedy summer amusement. Hop on board solo, or bring a friend along on a two-person unit, and get ready to gun it through the massive network of interconnected trails located in Bruce County's 600 acres of hardwood forest. Ride on Rentals provides the vehicles, helmets and basic operation instruction before setting you off on your journey. As an optional bonus, this offer includes a $20 credit towards a two-person kayaking rental to explore the serene waters of the Georgian Bay.

ROW.title: Up to 52% off EkoBrew Pods
ROW.description: Like stopping to eat the flowers or having your eyebrows brushed by a loved one, a fresh cup of coffee is one of life's simple pleasures. Marry a love of java with love for the environment in EkoBrew's reusable single-cup coffee pods. Designed for and compatible with most Keurig single-cup machines, EkoBrew pods can be filled with the grounds of your choice, then brewed with the touch of a button. Using a low tamp dispersion cone, coffee grounds are gently and evenly saturated for optimal extraction. Features like a heat-resistant silicone seal, easy-open lid, stainless steel mesh screen and flat-bottom design are convenient and user-friendly. A quick rinse after use and a weekly soak in dilute vinegar water keeps EkoBrew pods clean and free of residue.
